name: Family Connection Grants
objective: This program provides awards for the purpose of helping children who are in, or at risk of entering, foster care to reconnect with family members.
top_agency_name: Department of Health and Human Services
applicant_types: Local (includes State-designated Indian Tribes, excludes institutions of higher education and hospitals
Private nonprofit institution/organization (includes institutions of higher education and hospitals)
Public nonprofit institution/organization (includes institutions of higher education and hospitals)

results.description: 3 non-competing continuation grants will be awarded.  6 non-competing continuation grants were awarded.

Children whose family received Family Group Decision Making plus Navigation services were significantly more likely to have been reunified with their biological parents compared to children whose family received Kinship Navigation services only.

authorizations.text: IV, B, subpart 1, 427, Social Security Act.

rules_regulations: Recipients may refer to the Remarks section of the Notice of Grant Award for specific Terms and Conditions pertaining to this grant program.  Information on Post Award Requirements are posted at: https://www.acf.hhs.gov/discretionary-post-award-requirements#chapter-2.
